definition: lighted by or as if by twilight, the diffused light from the sky when the sun is below the horizon but its rays are refracted by the atmosphere of the earth
details:
adjective
- lighted by or as if by twilight
= synonyms: dusky
noun
- the diffused light from the sky when the sun is below the horizon but its rays are refracted by the atmosphere of the earth
- a condition of decline following successes
= example: a condition of decline following successes
- the time of day immediately following sunset
= example: the time of day immediately following sunset
= synonyms: fall
